name: XED
description: Founded in 2015, XED is a leading provider of executive education in Middle East, Far East, LATAM and South Asia. Catering to the niche segment of senior leaders, XED offers open and custom programs for individuals and organizations. XED partners with Ivy Leagues and top global universities to offer high-impact programs in strategy, leadership, entrepreneurship, innovation, digital and finance, delivered by world-renowned faculty. Leveraging technology and immersive learning formats, XED has empowered several senior leaders from diverse organizations, Fortune 500 companies and global brands.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: At XED, we are driven by a profound belief in the boundless potential of the human spirit.
ShortDescription: XED specializes in executive education & empowers organizations & individuals

Highlights.name: Innovation
Highlights.description: We are forward-thinking and adaptable, leading in education and technology to empower leaders for a dynamic world.

Highlights.name: Accountability
Highlights.description: We create a supportive environment, caring deeply about positive impacts on individuals and organizations.

Highlights.name: Compassion
Highlights.description: We take ownership, deliver on commitments, and ensure excellence to drive growth and progress.

enhanced_description: XED, founded in 2015 and headquartered in Singapore, is a leading provider of executive education specializing in high-impact programs for senior leaders and organizations. Operating with a global reach across the Middle East, Far East, LATAM, and South Asia, XED partners with Ivy League and top global universities. They offer both open and custom programs delivered by world-renowned faculty in critical areas such as strategy, leadership, entrepreneurship, innovation, digital, and finance. Leveraging technology and immersive learning formats, XED aims to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency, empowering senior leaders from diverse organizations, including Fortune 500 companies and global brands. The company's core values emphasize Innovation, Accountability, and Compassion, reflecting its commitment to leading in education and technology, delivering on commitments, and fostering positive impacts.
key_use_cases: Developing senior leadership capabilities (strategy, leadership, entrepreneurship, innovation, digital, finance)
Providing customized executive education programs for corporate organizations
Offering open enrollment programs for individual senior leaders seeking advanced skill development
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for executives and senior management
competitive_advantages: Strong academic partnerships with Ivy Leagues and top global universities
Access to world-renowned faculty for program delivery
Specialization in executive education for senior leaders and niche segments
Extensive global reach across Middle East, Far East, LATAM, and South Asia
Leveraging technology and immersive learning formats for innovative program delivery
Focus on high-impact programs designed for practical application
implementation_scenarios: Enrollment of individual senior leaders in open executive education programs
Customized program delivery tailored to the specific needs of organizations and their senior leadership teams
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency for senior leaders
Enhanced leadership capabilities across various strategic domains
Empowerment of senior leaders to drive organizational growth and progress
Delivery of high-impact learning outcomes for individuals and organizations
primary_users: Corporate HR departments (specifically Learning & Development or Talent Management teams)
